user_id.desc: user_id of account which is doing API call

account.title: account information
account.desc: Retrieve current balance, transaction list, account type and all elements related to your platform account.

show.title: Get information about your account
show.desc: Get information about your account: balance, accountType.

transactions.title: Get a list of the transactions made to your account
transactions.desc: Get the transactions from the user's Account..

user_id.desc: user_id of account which is doing API call

availableNumbers.title: Find and Buy available numbers
availableNumbers.desc: The Available Numbers resource lets you search for numbers that are available for use with your application.

searchLocal.title: Search an available local number
searchLocal.desc: Search and available local number that we can buy

state.desc: A two-letter US state abbreviation ('CA' for California)

localNumber.desc: It is defined as the first digits of a telephone number inside an area code for filtering the results. It must contain from 3 to 4 digits

inLocalCallingArea.desc: Boolean value to indicate that the search for available numbers must consider overlayed areas. Only applied for localNumber searching

quantity.desc: The maximum number of numbers to return (default 10, maximum 5000)

pattern.desc: A number pattern that may include letters, digits, and the following wildcard characters: ? : matches any single digit. * : matches zero or more digits.Don't forget to encode wildcard characters in the requested URL.

createLocal.title: Buy a local number
createLocal.desc: Search and order available local numbers

state.desc: A two-letter US state abbreviation ('CA' for California)

localNumber.desc: It is defined as the first digits of a telephone number inside an area code for filtering the results. It must contain from 3 to 4 digits

inLocalCallingArea.desc: Boolean value to indicate that the search for available numbers must consider overlayed areas. Only applied for localNumber searching

quantity.desc: The maximum number of numbers to return (default 10, maximum 5000)

searchTollFree.title: Search for available toll free numbers
searchTollFree.desc: Search for available toll free numbers

createTollFree.title: Search and order available toll free numbers
createTollFree.desc: Search and order available toll free numbers

user_id.desc: user_id of account which is doing API call

messages.title: message resources
messages.desc: Lets you send SMS text messages and view messages that were previously sent or received

fetch.title: Get a list of previous messages that were sent or received
fetch.desc: Get a list of previous messages that were sent or received

show.title: Read a message
show.desc: Get information about a message that was sent or received

user_id.desc: user_id of account which is doing API call

calls.title: Manipulation calls
calls.desc: The Calls resource lets you make phone calls and view information about previous inbound and outbound calls.

fetch.title: Gets a list of active and historic calls you made or received
fetch.desc: Gets a list of active and historic calls you made or received

show.title: Gets information about an active or completed call
show.desc: Gets information about an active or completed call. No query parameters are supported

update.title: Changes properties of an active phone call
update.desc: Changes properties of an active phone call

audio.title: Play an audio or speak a sentence in a call
audio.desc: Play an audio or speak a sentence in a call

recordings.title: Retrieve all recordings related to the call
recordings.desc: Retrieve all recordings related to the call

createGather.title: Gather the DTMF digits pressed
createGather.desc: Gather the DTMF digits pressed by the user.

gather.title: Get the gather DTMF parameters and results
gather.desc: Get the gather DTMF parameters and results

numberInfo.title: This resource provides a CNAM number info
numberInfo.desc: CNAM is an acronym which stands for Caller ID Name. CNAM can be used to display the calling party's name alongside the phone number, to help users easily identify a caller. CNAM API allows the user to get the CNAM information of a particular number

number.desc: phone number to get the info

show.title: Get the CNAM of the number
show.desc: Get the CNAM of the number

user_id.desc: user_id of account which is doing API call

phoneNumbers.title: The Phone Numbers resource lets you get phone numbers for use with your programs and manage numbers you already have
phoneNumbers.desc: The Phone Numbers resource lets you get phone numbers for use with your programs and manage numbers you already have

fetch.title: Gets a list of your numbers.
fetch.desc: Gets a list of your numbers.

create.title: Allocates a number so you can use it to make and receive calls and send and receive messages
create.desc: Allocates a number so you can use it to make and receive calls and send and receive messages

number.desc: An available telephone number you want to use (must be in E.164 format, like +19195551212)

applicationId.desc: The ID of an Application you want to associate with this number

name.desc: A name you choose for this number

fallbackNumber.desc: Number to transfer an incoming call when the callback/fallback events can't be delivered

showById.title: Gets information about one of your numbers using the number's ID
showById.desc: Gets information about one of your numbers using the number's ID

showByNumber.title: Gets information about one of your numbers using the number itself
showByNumber.desc: Gets information about one of your numbers using the E.164 number string, like +19195551212. Remember to URL encode the plus sign prefix

update.title: Make changes to a number you have
update.desc: Makes changes to a number you have. POST a new JSON representation with the property values you desire to the URL that you got back in the "Location" header when you first allocated it. Properties you don't send will remain unchanged.

number_id.desc: id of phone number in twilio system. The ID of a number can be found by showByNumber

destroy.title: Remove a number from your account
destroy.desc: emoves a number from your account so you can no longer make or receive calls, or send or receive messages with it. When you remove a number from your account, it will not immediately become available for re-use, so be careful.

number_id.desc: id of phone number in twilio system. The ID of a number can be found by showByNumber

user_id.desc: user_id of account which is doing API call

conferences.title: Conference resouce
conferences.desc: The Conference resource allows you create conferences, add members to it, play audio, speak text, mute/unmute members, hold/unhold members and other things related to conferencing.

from.desc: the phone number which conferences will be created on it

createMember.title: Add a member to a conference.
createMember.desc: Add a member to a conference.

callId.desc: Call ID to join into conference

audio.title: Play an audio/speak a sentence in the conference.
audio.desc: Play an audio/speak a sentence in the conference.

user_id.desc: user_id of account which is doing API call

bridges.title: Bridges resource
bridges.desc: Bridges resource. Bridge two calls allowing two way audio between them.

bridgeAudio.desc: Enable/Disable two way audio path (default = true)

callIds.desc: The list of call ids in the bridge. If the list of call ids is not provided the bridge is logically created and it can be used to place calls later.

audio.title: Play an audio or speak a sentence in a bridge
audio.desc: Play an audio or speak a sentence in a bridge

listCall.title: Get the list of calls that are on the bridge
listCall.desc: Get the list of calls that are on the bridge

update.title: Change calls in a bridge and bridge/unbridge the audio
update.desc: Change calls in a bridge and bridge/unbridge the audio

user_id.desc: user_id of account which is doing API call

recordings.title: Retrieve call recordings, filtering by Id, user and/or calls
recordings.desc: Retrieve call recordings, filtering by Id, user and/or calls. Learn how record a Call The recording information retrieved by GET method contains only textual data related to call recording as described on Properties section. To properly work with recorded media content such as download and removal of media file, please access Media documentation

show.title: Retrieve a specific call recording information, identified by recordingId
show.desc: Retrieve a specific call recording information, identified by recordingId

user_id.desc: user_id of account which is doing API call

errors.title: User Errors
errors.desc: The User Errors resource lets you see information about errors that happened in your API calls and during applications callbacks. This error information can be very helpful when you're debugging an application.  Because error information can be large, and errors in the distant past are less useful than new ones, Bandwidth API limits the number of user errors it keeps.

show.title: Gets information about one user error
show.desc: Gets information about one user error

fetch.title: Gets all the user errors for a user
fetch.desc: Gets all the user errors for a user
